Title: Mining Basics
Description: Learn how to mine resources from asteroids to build and upgrade your ship.

Steps.Title: Introduction to Mining
Steps.Message: Mining is essential for gathering resources. You'll need resources to build and upgrade your ship.

Steps.Title: Finding Asteroids
Steps.Message: Look for asteroids in your sector. They appear as floating rocks and contain valuable resources like Iron, Titanium, and more.

Steps.Title: Mining Lasers
Steps.Message: To mine, you need mining lasers equipped on your ship. Approach an asteroid and fire your mining laser to extract resources.

Steps.Title: Mine Your First Resource
Steps.Message: Now try mining some resources! Find an asteroid and use your mining laser. Resources will automatically be added to your inventory.

Steps.Title: Mining Complete!
Steps.Message: Great job! You've learned how to mine resources. Continue mining to gather materials for building and trading.
